## Vault.delete() method

**Signature:**

```typescript
delete(file: TAbstractFile, force?: boolean): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  file | [TAbstractFile](./obsidian.tabstractfile.md) | The file or folder to be deleted |
|  force | boolean | _(Optional)_ Should attempt to delete folder even if it has hidden children |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;void&gt;
